Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForClicks("AnyDown", "AnyUp") self:SetBackdrop({ bgFile = "Interface\\Tooltips\\UI-Tooltip-Background", tile = true, tileSize = 16, }) self:SetBackdropColor(1, 0, 0, 0)
Scripts.OnEnter: local buff = Stuf.units.player.buffgroup[self:GetID()] if buff and buff:GetScript("OnEnter") then buff:GetScript("OnEnter")(buff) end self:SetBackdropColor(1, 0, 0, 0.7)
